title: Dating app for heavy news readers
author: awinter-py
content: meet who read newsnewsmatch is literate dating app people love read articles discuss interests passions other -minded .were launching summer 2017. sign for waitlist receive exclusive early access the newsmatch app:email locationcurate profile sharing favorite articles. other apps, re a pretty face. newsmatch, profile shows articles read. what others are reading connect people share interests. whether 're politics, sports, spaceflight basket weaving, 'll figure out your articles show matches overlapping interests.chat meet .because matches start a shared interest, 's easy strike a conversation make plans meet offline.dont forget sign for waitlist be first know newsmatch launches! sign love idea? hate ? email love-@newsmatch..
